name: WMATADCMetroStatus
0:
”Alexa open metro status”
”Alexa ask metro status for next Silver line at Metro Center”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metro status
des:
This skill will provide real time train arrival information for any line at any WMATA station. If there are multiple destinations of the same line, it will list them out. It will also tell users the subsequent arrival times to each destination in case the user can not make it to the next train.
This skill is not affiliated with Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
